name: Interview with horny Horse Princess
description:
* Introduction

A documentary that a horse princess (a centaur woman) gets her kingdom back.
The story goes on during with interviews with her.
We will tell you all about the struggles of the noble and a little arrogant Horse Princess!

Animated RPG!
Both the pictures and the event pictures are animated!


* Prologue

A special interview with the Princess who played a key role in bringing back the country that was destroyed by the Horse King!

Interviewer: "Congratulations!
You defeated the Horse king by yourself. And you take back your country! It's amazing!"

Princess: "Hmm, thank you.
I think it's because I care about my people. So I did it."

Interviewer: "Oh, by the way, I'm angry!"

Princess: "Angry about what?"

Interviewer: "About the fact...The people's dream, the dainty princess.
That is you! But you were turned into a horse lady!!"

Princess: "Oh, yeah...That was a curse."
Horse king wanted me to give birth to his child. It was in order to break the hearts of the people.
But it was impossible between a human and a monster.
So the Horse king put a curse on me and turned me into a centaur."

Interviewer: "So that's the reason, that makes sense. I get it. I'm really glad that the curse is away.
By the way, how did you get rid of the curse?"

Princess: "Well, I was necessary to defeat the Horse king, the one who put the curse on me."

Interviewer: "Oh, I see!
And you defeated him, and regained both your true human form and your country."

Princess: "That's right."


* Sex scenes

Abuse (cart, whipping)
Tentacles
Dragon
Orc
Human
Dwarf
Incubus...... sex with various races!
She also shakes her hips, even though she doesn't want to.
And even against a dragon, she repeatedly have sex with so hard that the dragon become exhausted.


* Situations

Used as a horse, whipped, and then fist-fucked.
In a dream... In order to deceive the enemy...
In order to deal, she offers her body...
In the middle of battle, she is entangled in tentacles...
In order to regain her country and her human form, she has sex as a horse!


* Characters

Horse Princess
The protagonist is the princess of a country that was destroyed by the Horse King.
She was cursed and turned into a centaur, but she is determined to get her country back.

Interviewer
She interviews with a princess who has regained her country.
Sometimes she is...rude.. but as a journalist, she will reveal the Horse Princess's experiences!
